BenefitDisbursementAdj.name: BenefitDisbursementAdj
BenefitDisbursementAdj.description: Represents the changes of an enrollee's benefit that can be made as monetary or non-monetary with similar units of measure.

AdjustmentAmount.description: Required. The amount that's adjusted in the benefit disbursement.

AdjustmentReason.description: The reason for the adjustment in the disbursement amount.

BenefitAssignmentAdjustmentId.description: The benefit assignment adjustment associated with this disbursement.

BenefitDisbursementId.description: Required. The benefit disbursement associated with this adjustment.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the benefit disbursement adjustment.
